mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectItemInfo */ A.CTR_NO , A.CTR_ID , A.CTR_NM , A1.TEL_NM , A1.TEL_NUM , A2.MBL_NM , A2.MBL_NUM , A3.EML_NM , A3.EML_ADDR , A4.BNK_NM , A4.BNK_ACNT , A4.ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , A5.MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_CTR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.CTR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'CTR' WHERE 1=1 AND A.CTR_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{ctrid})
SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectCampPeriod */ TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE + 30, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DT FROM DUAL

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectAraCpnTyp */ A.GRP_CD , A.GRP_NM , A1.CODE , A1.CD_NM , A1.CD_DESC , A1.SORT_NO , A1.USE_YN FROM ARA2_CDGRP A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = A.GRP_CD AND A1.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.GRP_CD = 'C009' ORDER BY A.GRP_CD , A1.SORT_NO
SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectSeqCampKey */ NVL(MOD(MAX(CAMP_NO), 1000), 0) AS KEY_SEQ_CAMP FROM ARA2_CAMP
SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectSeqCampKey */ SEQ_CAMP.CURRVAL AS CURR_SEQ_CAMP , MOD(SEQ_CAMP.CURRVAL, 1000) AS KEY_SEQ_CAMP , MOD(1923, 1000) AS TEST_MOD FROM DUAL

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectCampList1 */ A.CAMP_NO , A.CAMP_NM , A.CAMP_DESC , A.CAMP_PHS , TO_CHAR(A.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(A.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_CNT , A.CPN_SUM , A.CPN_MST , A.CAMP_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , A.UPD_DTTM , A1.CD_NM FROM ARA2_CAMP A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND A1.CODE = A.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAMP_PHS = '1' ORDER BY A.CAMP_NO DESC
mapper.update: DELETE /* Ara2Ctr.deleteCampCpnSht */ ARA2_CPN WHERE 1=1 AND CAMP_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{campNo})
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectCampNoInfo */ A.CAMP_NO , A.CAMP_NM , A.CAMP_DESC , A.CAMP_PHS , TO_CHAR(A.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(A.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_CNT , A.CPN_SUM , A.CPN_MST , A.CAMP_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , A.UPD_DTTM , A1.CD_NM FROM ARA2_CAMP A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND A1.CODE = A.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAMP_PHS = '1' AND A.CAMP_NO = TO_NUMBER(#{campNo}) ORDER BY A.CAMP_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara2Ctr.insertCampCpnSht */ ARA2_CPN VALUES ( #{CAMP_NO}, TO_NUMBER(#{ctrid}), 'CTR', '1', #{CPN_MST}, #{CPN_TYP}, TO_NUMBER(#{CPN_MNY}), #{cpnNo}, '쿠폰을 발행합니다', SYSDATE, NULL )
mapper.update: UPDATE /* Ara2Ctr.updateCampNoInfo */ ARA2_CAMP SET CAMP_PHS = '2' , CAMP_CNTNT = '쿠폰패키지를 발행' , UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND CAMP_PHS = '1' AND CAMP_NO = #{CAMP_NO}
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectCampList2 */ A.CAMP_NO , A.CAMP_NM , A.CAMP_DESC , A.CAMP_PHS , TO_CHAR(A.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(A.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS END_DT , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_CNT , A.CPN_SUM , A.CPN_MST , A.CAMP_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , A.UPD_DTTM , A1.CD_NM FROM ARA2_CAMP A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND A1.CODE = A.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND A.CAMP_PHS = '2' ORDER BY A.CAMP_NO DESC

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectPaymentCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CPN_PHS = '5' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara2Ctr.insertAcntDpst */ ARA2_ACNTHIST SELECT SEQ_ACNTHIST.NEXTVAL , A.ITM_ID , A.ITM_TYP , C.SUM_MNY , 0 , A.ACNT_BLNC + C.SUM_MNY , '005' , '쿠폰정산과 입금함' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST A , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ITM_ID ) B , ( SELECT C.ITM_NO , SUM(C.CPN_MNY) AS SUM_MNY FROM ARA2_CPN C WHERE 1=1 AND C.CPN_PHS = '0' GROUP BY C.ITM_NO ) C WHERE 1=1 AND C.ITM_NO = B.ITM_ID AND A.ITM_ID = B.ITM_ID AND A.ACNTHIST_NO = B.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectCompleteCalcList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CPN_PHS = '6' ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectNotUsedCpnList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CPN_PHS = '7' /* from 3 to 7 */ ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectSettlementDiscardList */ A.CAMP_NO , A.ITM_NO , A.ITM_TYP , A.CPN_PHS , A1.CD_DESC , A.CPN_MST , A.CPN_TYP , A.CPN_MNY , A.CPN_NO , A.CPN_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM , TO_CHAR(A.UPD_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPD_DTTM , B.CAMP_NM , B.CAMP_PHS , B1.CD_DESC AS CAMP_CD_DESC , TO_CHAR(B.BGN_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_BGN_DT , TO_CHAR(B.END_DT, 'YY-MM-DD') AS CAMP_END_DT FROM ARA2_CPN A LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE A1 ON A1.GRP_CD = 'C002' AND A1.CODE = A.CPN_PHS , ARA2_CAMP B LEFT JOIN ARA2_CODE B1 ON B1.GRP_CD = 'C012' AND B1.CODE = B.CAMP_PHS WHERE 1=1 AND B.CAMP_NO = A.CAMP_NO AND A.ITM_TYP = 'STR' AND A.CPN_PHS in ('8', '9') ORDER BY A.CPN_MNY DESC , A.CPN_NO ASC

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectStrAcntList */ A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , A1.ACNT_BLNC FROM ARA2_STR A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT B.ACNTHIST_NO , B.ITM_ID , B.ITM_TYP , B.ACNT_BLNC FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST B , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY ITM_ID ) C WHERE 1=1 AND B.ITM_ID = C.ITM_ID AND B.ACNTHIST_NO = C.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO ) A1 ON A1.ITM_ID = A.STR_ID WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.STR_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara2Ctr.insertStrAcnt */ ARA2_ACNTHIST VALUES ( SEQ_ACNTHIST.NEXTVAL , #{strid} , 'STR' , 0 , 0 , 0 , '001' , '계좌를 생성함' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectAcntList */ A.ACNTHIST_NO , A.ITM_ID , A.ITM_TYP , A1.STR_NM , A.ACNT_BLNC , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST A LEFT JOIN ARA2_STR A1 ON A1.STR_ID = A.ITM_ID , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 /* AND ITM_ID = 101 */ GROUP BY ITM_ID ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_ID = B.ITM_ID AND A.ACNTHIST_NO = B.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO ORDER BY A.ITM_ID
SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectStrList */ A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM FROM ARA2_STR A WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.STR_ID

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectAcntInOutList */ A.ACNTHIST_NO , A.ITM_ID , A.ITM_TYP , A1.STR_NM , A.ACNT_DPST , A.ACNT_WTHD , A.ACNT_BLNC , A.ETC_CD , A.ETC_CNTNT , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DTTM, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CRE_DTTM FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST A LEFT JOIN ARA2_STR A1 ON A1.STR_ID = A.ITM_ID WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_ID = #{strid} ORDER BY A.ACNTHIST_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* Ara2Ctr.insertStrDpstProc */ ARA2_ACNTHIST SELECT SEQ_ACNTHIST.NEXTVAL , A.ITM_ID , A.ITM_TYP , TO_NUMBER(#{dpst}) , 0 , A.ACNT_BLNC + TO_NUMBER(#{dpst}) , '002' , '센터입금함' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST A , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 AND ITM_ID = #{strid} GROUP BY ITM_ID ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_ID = B.ITM_ID AND A.ACNTHIST_NO = B.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO

INSERT INTO /* Ara2Ctr.insertStrWthdProc */ ARA2_ACNTHIST SELECT SEQ_ACNTHIST.NEXTVAL , A.ITM_ID , A.ITM_TYP , 0 , TO_NUMBER(#{wthd}) , A.ACNT_BLNC - TO_NUMBER(#{wthd}) , '002' , '센터출금함' , SYSDATE , SYSDATE FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST A , ( SELECT ITM_ID , MAX(ACNTHIST_NO) AS MAX_ACNTHIST_NO FROM ARA2_ACNTHIST WHERE 1=1 AND ITM_ID = #{strid} GROUP BY ITM_ID ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITM_ID = B.ITM_ID AND A.ACNTHIST_NO = B.MAX_ACNTHIST_NO
mapper.select: SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectStrInfoList */ A.STR_NO , A.STR_ID , A.STR_NM , A.REL_CTR_NO , NVL(A1.TEL_NM , '-') AS TEL_NM , NVL(A1.TEL_NUM , '-') AS TEL_NUM , NVL(A2.MBL_NM , '-') AS MBL_NM , NVL(A2.MBL_NUM , '-') AS MBL_NUM , NVL(A3.EML_NM , '-') AS EML_NM , NVL(A3.EML_ADDR, '-') AS EML_ADDR , NVL(A4.BNK_NM , '-') AS BNK_NM , NVL(A4.BNK_ACNT, '-') AS BNK_ACNT , NVL(A4.ACNT_NM , '-') AS ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , NVL(A5.MRRG_LOC, '-') AS MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_STR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'STR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.STR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'STR' WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.STR_NO

SELECT /* Ara2Ctr.selectUsrInfoList */ A.USR_NO , A.USR_ID , A.USR_NM , A.REL_STR_NO , NVL(A1.TEL_NM , '-') AS TEL_NM , NVL(A1.TEL_NUM , '-') AS TEL_NUM , NVL(A2.MBL_NM , '-') AS MBL_NM , NVL(A2.MBL_NUM , '-') AS MBL_NUM , NVL(A3.EML_NM , '-') AS EML_NM , NVL(A3.EML_ADDR, '-') AS EML_ADDR , NVL(A4.BNK_NM , '-') AS BNK_NM , NVL(A4.BNK_ACNT, '-') AS BNK_ACNT , NVL(A4.ACNT_NM , '-') AS ACNT_NM , A5.MRRG_DT , NVL(A5.MRRG_LOC, '-') AS MRRG_LOC FROM ARA2_USR A LEFT JOIN ARA2_TEL A1 ON A1.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A1.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MBL A2 ON A2.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A2.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_EML A3 ON A3.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A3.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_BNK A4 ON A4.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A4.ITM_TYP = 'USR' LEFT JOIN ARA2_MRRG A5 ON A5.ITM_NO = A.USR_NO AND A5.ITM_TYP = 'USR' WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY A.USR_NO
